title: Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 367 of 2023), hereby order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Regulation of Lobbying and Oireachtas
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Regulation of Lobbying and Oireachtas 
(Allowances to Members) (Amendment) Act 2023 (Commencement) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited regulation lobbying oireachtas (allowances members) (amendment) act 2023 (commencement) order

title: Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 367 of 2023), hereby order
Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 367 of 2023), hereby order
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of 
the Regulation of Lobbying and Oireachtas 
(Allowances to Members) (Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 15 of 2023) shall come 
into operation: 

(a) 

sections 1 to 8; 

(b) 

sections 11 and 12; 

(c) 

sections 19 to 23; 

(d) 

section 25.
text_norm: 2 1st day january 2024 appointed day following provision regulation lobbying oireachtas (allowances members) (amendment) act 2023 (no 15 2023) shall come operation (a) section 1 8 (b) section 11 12 (c) section 19 23 (d) section 25

title: Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 367 of 2023), hereby order
heading: 3. The 1st day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 1st day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
the Regulation of Lobbying and Oireachtas 

following provisions of 
(Allowances to Members) (Amendment) Act 2023 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 9 and 10; 

(b) 

sections 13 to 18. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 November, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th November, 2023.
